title: What can be done to get rid of those lane closings (great examples are on College Road at MLK Pkwy that merge into the lane next to it) that extend past the stop lights?  They are used by aggressive drivers to jump in front of other drivers that are in the correct lanes of flow.  It is super annoying and presents traffic hazards ALL the time.  Is there ANY way to make them disappear????
text:
The only way we could find is if you decide to start a campaign to
get enough people to call/email/both the NCDOT enough. Many voices
often get the job done, but as of now, there are no funds linked to
such a project.
